title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with correct username and password, and the session persists.

steps.description: Navigate to the authentication page
Input valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard
Verify session is created and persists on page reload

title: User login fails with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when an invalid username or password is provided and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the authentication page
Input invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails
Verify appropriate error message is displayed

title: Dashboard metrics display accurate statistics
description: Verify the dashboard shows correct and up-to-date business metrics and the sales trend charts load properly.

steps.description: Log in with a valid user
Verify dashboard cards display correct key metrics (sales, inventory levels, etc.)
Verify sales trend charts render with correct data
Refresh data and verify dashboard updates accordingly

title: Create new sale transaction with customer and product autocomplete
description: Verify that new transactions can be created in Kasir with autocomplete functionality for customers and products working correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Kasir (POS) module
Type in customer field to trigger autocomplete and select a customer
Type in product field to trigger autocomplete and select multiple products
Input quantities and verify formula-based calculations for totals
Save the transaction as a full payment
Verify the transaction is stored and reflected in the system

title: Create sale transaction with down payment (DP)
description: Verify that a sale transaction can be saved with a down payment and reflects correct due amounts.

steps.description: Navigate to Kasir (POS) module
Create a new transaction with selected customer and products
Select the option to save as down payment (DP)
Input down payment amount
Save the transaction
Verify the transaction is recorded with correct DP and due balance

title: Edit and update existing invoice transaction
description: Verify the user can edit an existing invoice's items and update the transaction correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to transaction history
Select an invoice to edit
Modify product quantities or add/remove products
Save changes
Verify updated transaction details are saved and reflected in the system

title: Delete an invoice transaction and verify related data cleanup
description: Verify that deleting an invoice removes it and related records properly from the system.

steps.description: Navigate to transaction history
Select an invoice to delete
Confirm the deletion
Verify the invoice and all related data (items, payments) are removed

title: Create and convert quotation to invoice
description: Verify quotations can be created properly and converted into invoices for checkout.

steps.description: Navigate to Quotation module
Create a new quotation with products and customer details
Save the quotation
Verify quotation is stored and can be viewed
Select the quotation and convert to invoice
Verify the invoice is generated correctly and saved

title: Product inventory search, filter, pagination and CRUD operations
description: Verify product list supports search and filters, pagination works correctly, and products can be created, edited and deleted with appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to Product Management module
Use search to find a product by name
Verify search results are filtered correctly
Apply filters (e.g. by category, stock levels)
Verify filtered results match criteria
Navigate pagination to switch pages
Verify correct products show per page
Add a new product with required details
Verify product is added and listed
Edit an existing product's fields
Verify changes are saved and reflected
Delete a product
Verify product is removed from list

title: Customer management CRUD with data update validation
description: Verify customers can be added, edited, and deleted, and related transaction counts update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Customer Management module
Add a new customer with valid data
Verify the customer appears in the customer list
Edit customer information
Verify updated customer data is saved
Delete a customer who has no transactions
Verify the customer is removed from the list
Check transaction count for a customer
Verify correct number of related transactions is shown

title: Vendor management CRUD and data verification
description: Verify vendors can be created, updated, and deleted, and their related transaction counts are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to Vendor Management module
Add a new vendor with required details
Verify vendor appears in vendor list
Edit vendor information
Verify updated vendor data is saved
Delete a vendor without active transactions
Verify vendor is removed
Check related transaction counts for a vendor
Verify transaction count is accurate

title: Payment settlement with full payment updates
description: Verify that full payment settlements update invoice status correctly and payment records are saved.

steps.description: Navigate to Payment Settlement module
Select an unpaid invoice
Input full payment amount and select payment method
Submit the payment
Verify invoice status updates to paid
Verify payment record is created and saved

title: Payment settlement with down payment partial payment
description: Verify payment settlements with down payments update invoice with correct partial payment and due amounts.

steps.description: Navigate to Payment Settlement module
Select an unpaid invoice
Input partial payment amount as down payment
Select payment method and submit
Verify invoice status updates appropriately for partial payment
Verify payment record reflects partial payment details

title: Edit existing payment record and verify updates
description: Verify users can edit previously saved payment records and changes are reflected correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Payment Settlement module
Select an existing payment record to edit
Modify payment amount or method
Save the payment record
Verify updated payment data is stored and reflected in invoice status

title: Invoice generation and printing for full payment
description: Verify invoices generated from completed transactions with full payment have correct format and printable layout.

steps.description: Complete a transaction with full payment
Navigate to Invoice Management module
Generate invoice from completed transaction
Verify invoice displays correct transaction information and full payment status
Print the invoice
Verify printed layout is correct and complete

title: Invoice generation and printing for down payment (DP) transaction
description: Verify invoices generated for transactions with down payments show correct amounts, balances and printable format.

steps.description: Complete a transaction with down payment
Navigate to Invoice Management module
Generate invoice from DP transaction
Verify invoice displays amounts paid, outstanding balance, and status
Print the invoice
Verify printed layout is correct and complete

title: Data synchronization success between local IndexedDB and Google Sheets
description: Verify that local cache using IndexedDB syncs properly with Google Sheets backend, maintaining data consistency.

steps.description: Perform data CRUD operations locally
Trigger data synchronization to Google Sheets
Verify changes are reflected in Google Sheets data
Modify Google Sheets data externally
Perform sync to update local IndexedDB
Verify local IndexedDB cache reflects Google Sheets changes accurately

title: Display loading states and error messages during CRUD operations
description: Verify that loading indicators appear during data fetching or updates, and error messages display on failures.

steps.description: Trigger a data fetch or submit action in any module (e.g., product addition)
Verify loading indicator is visible during operation
Simulate a failure in backend (e.g., network disconnect)
Verify error message is displayed with meaningful text to user

title: Session timeout and automatic logout
description: Verify that when user session expires, the application logs out the user and redirects to login page with notifications.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Wait until session timeout expires or simulate timeout
Verify user is automatically logged out
Verify user is redirected to login page with session expired notification

title: Invalid input handling in forms
description: Verify all forms validate inputs correctly and display proper validation messages for incorrect or missing data.

steps.description: Open forms in modules such as product addition, customer creation, quotation creation
Input invalid or incomplete data in required fields
Attempt to submit the form
Verify appropriate validation error messages appear
Verify form submission is blocked until errors are corrected
